thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Paul
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text: The home delivery , when the item was not in stock in the shop , was made very quickly. There was no urgency and I would have waited a few days. I happened to be at home when the delivery was made. However, if you are not at home, couriers can be problematic as they do not have the fall back of An Post local post offices. This might be of interest in case the company wants to offer the options for delivery - maybe standard parcel service can be used.
